articles.description: From being a teacher at South Umpqua High School, to grant writing, to owning her own clothing business, to owning her own bed and breakfast, to now writing a historical fiction novel series — former Roseburg resident Linda Jones Weber…
articles.title: Roseburg resident writes historical fiction novel, will present at Douglas County Museum
